title: Double Arm Front Raises
description: Stand with your back straight, your feet shoulder width apart, and your arms hanging naturally by your sides Keeping your arms fully extended and your torso stationary, lift your hands up and out in front of you until they reach your shoulder level, exhale as you do so Lightly squeeze your shoulder muscles at the top position Gently lower your arms back to the starting position in a smooth controlled movement inhaling as you do so
